caption.description: A single sentence summarizing the entire image content.

main_subjects.description: A list of the most important people, vehicles, or objects visible.

item.description: The name of the subject (e.g., 'Man', 'White Classic Car').

description.description: Key details about the subject (e.g., clothing, color, condition).

position.description: Where it is located in the frame (e.g., foreground, background left).

aesthetic_score.description: A score ranging from 1-10 which describes how aesthetically pleasing the image is.

decade_guess.description: The estimated decade or era based on visual cues (e.g., '1970s' or '2010s').

environment.description: Description of the background environment (e.g., 'Quiet suburban street with houses and utility poles').

details.description: A list of secondary observations, such as colors, textures, or specific artifacts (like street signs or fence types).
